text: AFAT (file allocation table) based file system is being used and the total overhead of each entry in the FAT is 4 bytes in size. Given a 100 x 10° bytes disk on which the file system is stored and data block size is 10° bytes, the maximum size of a file that can be stored on this disk in units of 10 bytes is gatecse-2014-set2 operating-system disk numerical-answers normal file-system
